means: 寻找，探寻( seek的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Some feminists sought reforms within the existing social order.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些女权主义者寻求在现存的社会制度内进行改革。

sentence.Network_en: This site remained undiscovered, though long sought, until recent times.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽经长期寻找，但该遗址直到最近才被发现。

sentence.Network_en: The Swedes had sought his freedom through quiet diplomacy.
sentence.Network_cn: 瑞典人通过秘密的外交手段来争取他的自由。

PerfectNetExp.abs: A new method must be sought for layered - medium with arbitrary dip ., 对任意倾斜层状介质必须寻求新的方法.

staircase aisle was wet rainy days , the location of mobile air-conditioning installed " unsightly " is the developer first sought , the property company in the common diseases .下雨天楼梯过道被打湿，空调安装位置错落“有碍观瞻”等，这是发展商先交房、物业公司后进驻的常见病。

list.abs: 单词常用法笔记（１）_梁军_新浪博客 ... Law of Inertia 惯性定律 Sought-after 很吃香的，受欢迎的 trail 失去(旅游者)踪迹.
When Henry Ford first sought financial backing for making cars ., 当亨利 . 福特最初制造汽车为寻求资金支持时.
Many locals have sought to diversify their enterprises and generate additional income ., 很多本地企业试图将企业多元化从而增加额外的收入.
The Allies sought to break through the German lines ., 协约国力图突破德军防线.
Stating Your Job Objective（说明应聘职位） ... career objective 职业目标 position sought 谋求职位 position wanted 希望职位.
个人简历常用词汇-求职面试-中国教育文摘 ... career objective 职业目标 position sought 谋位 position wanted 希望职位.

entry.def: Sought is the past tense and past participle of seek.

sentences.sentence: "the most sought-after item was the silver candelabrum"

auth_sentence.content: Recently, they sought a six-figure line of credit.

auth_sentence.content: She sought Wednesday to downplay the memo's impact.
